metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2183 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In generateServicesMap of RegisteredServicesCache.java, there is a possibleaccount protection bypass due to a caching optimization. This could lead tolocal information disclosure with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-9 Android-10Android ID: A-136261465

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
